name: Bed Mobility Timing Mismatch Factor (M_T)
functionStatement: Bed mobilizes near bankfull (~12 yr) to maintain channel form and habitat without chronic instability.
descriptionMarkdown: Mismatch factor relative to target return interval (e.g., 1.5 yr): M_T = max(T/1.5, 1.5/T). Lower is better; minimum is 1.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Estimate return interval T when ?* exceeds critical for D50; compute M_T.
